title: The Biograph Girl
description: Meticulously blending fact and real-life characters with fiction, this richly textured historical novel re-creates the life of Florence Lawrence, an early twentieth-century actress and vaudevillian who by 1910, was the "Biograph Girl," the world's first movie star. By the author of The Life and Times of William Haines. 40,000 first printing.
author: William J. Mann
